GET_SETTING_DATA: SELECT code,value FROM c_app_setting where is_deleted=0;
GET_APP_STARTUP_DATA: SELECT code,display_name,value from c_app_setting where is_deleted=0 and code in ('KACCOUNTCUSTOMERID','UPLOADRECORDLIMIT','SCHEDULEJOBDURATIONINDAYS','ISCAPTCHAMANDATORY');
GET_PUBLICLY_EXPOSED_APP_STARTUP_DATA: SELECT code,display_name,value from c_app_setting where is_deleted=0 and code in ('ISCAPTCHAMANDATORY');
